detaileddescription.para:
Periodically handle the animations.
param
unused

Called when an animation is ready to do the necessary thinks e.g. repeat, play back, delete etc.
a
pointer to an animation descriptor
true: animation delete occurred nnd the LV_GC_ROOT(_lv_anim_ll) has changed

Create an animation
a
an initialized 'anim_t' variable. Not required after call.

Delete an animation of a variable with a given animator function
var
pointer to variable
exec_cb
a function pointer which is animating 'var', or NULL to delete all the animations of 'var'
true: at least 1 animation is deleted, false: no animation is deleted

Get the number of currently running animations
the number of running animations

Calculate the time of an animation with a given speed and the start and end values
speed
speed of animation in unit/sec
start
start value of the animation
end
end value of the animation
the required time [ms] for the animation with the given parameters

Calculate the current value of an animation applying linear characteristic
a
pointer to an animation
the current value to set

Calculate the current value of an animation slowing down the start phase
a
pointer to an animation
the current value to set

Calculate the current value of an animation slowing down the end phase
a
pointer to an animation
the current value to set

Calculate the current value of an animation applying an "S" characteristic (cosine)
a
pointer to an animation
the current value to set

Calculate the current value of an animation with overshoot at the end
a
pointer to an animation
the current value to set

Calculate the current value of an animation with 3 bounces
a
pointer to an animation
the current value to set

Calculate the current value of an animation applying step characteristic. (Set end value on the end of the animation)
a
pointer to an animation
the current value to set
